name: Revenge of the Blade || T.5 Beta
name_original: Revenge of the Blade || T.5 Beta
description:
Revenge of the Blade || T.5 Beta is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by andromedapi. It came out on 30-11-2020.
Revenge of the Blade || T.5 Beta is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
